name: .AP File Extension
summary: Learn about .AP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Active Web page that contains HTML as well as JavaScript, .FGL code, or code written in another scripting language; requires supporting software on the Web server to run; can be used to generate dynamic Web pages.

content: An AP page is similar to a .PHP or .ASP page, but uses a generic extension since it can contain multiple types of code. AP files are recognized by the Open5g platform.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
